message_1: Suppose you have a plaintext message "HELLO" that you want to encrypt using block cipher Rijndael with a block size of 128 bits and a key size of 192 bits. How many rounds of encryption and key addition will be performed?
message_2: When using the Rijndael block cipher with a block size of 128 bits and a key size of 192 bits, there will be a total of 12 rounds of encryption and key addition performed.
